pap.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: films, programmes, books etc that are badly made or badly written, are intended for entertainment only, and have no serious value
pap.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Hollywood produces a lot of pap.
pap.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: very soft food that does not have a strong taste, like the food that babies eat
pap.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: if a famous person is papped, one of the paparazzi takes a photograph of them without asking them, for a newspaper or magazine
pap.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: The singer was papped coming out of a nightclub.
